definition: nonsense/ridiculous talk/hogwash
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
surname Hu
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: The patient began to rave incoherently at the nurses.
sentences.chinese: 病人對護士說起胡話來。

sentences.english: Are you going to listen to her ravings?
ShenXing face zhao, a lot of nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 沈星面對趙來說了一大堆胡話。

sentences.english: That's why nonsense verse has such appeal to young children.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼胡話詩對小孩子有特別的吸引力。

sentences.english: Who's been telling you such stuff?
sentences.chinese: 是誰和你說的這些胡話？

sentences.english: Jean Valjean stared him straight in the eye and thought that he was raving.
sentences.chinese: 冉阿讓直着雙眼，老望他，以爲他在說胡話。

sentences.english: Rebecca: I think that's a bunch of nonsense. It seemed ok to me.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他在那說胡話，在我看來他一點事不曾。

sentences.english: The doctor thought that she was delirious. She added
While he had the fever,he raved all night long.
sentences.chinese: 他在發高燒的時候，說了一夜的胡話。

sentences.english: As you slept, you cried out a number of times in delirium , she said.
sentences.chinese: 你睡的時候，說胡話大喊了好多次，她說。

sentences.english: He raved all night in his fever.
sentences.chinese: 他發燒時，整個晚上都說胡話。

sentences.english: These are the mere ravings of megalomaniacs.
sentences.chinese: 這是自大狂者的一派胡話。
他在高燒中不停地說胡話。

definition: sneering/sarcasm/cynical remarks
to die/to drop dead
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
chicken-hearted (idiom)/gutless
to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
to change (appearance)/to change shape
red in the face/extremely angry
reckless/extremely daring
unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: to speak incoherently/to ramble/to talk irresponsibly
to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
lit. mandarin ducks playing in the water/fig. to make love
mournful/miserable
the guilty party files the suit/the thief cries thief
to scratch an itch
